magical_items.description: a gemstone with faintly carved runes on each facet
three marbles, each humming a slightly different note
a jar of pickled beets, swirling with sparkles
a small figurine shaped like a dog that changes its posture when you aren't looking
a small, smooth stone with the image of a cat carved into its surface

money.description: a pouch filled with an unknown amount of money
a single ruby the size of a fist
a small pouch of platinum coins

other.description: a clue that points the party in the right direction for their main quest
